xtgeo_grid3d_map_apps

Usage¶

xtgeo_grid3d_map_apps is a command line script that computes HC thicknesses based on Eclipse input.

Running from command line¶

Minimum command line¶

xtgeo_grid3d_map_apps --config myfile.yaml

Override the Eclipse root¶

Her the Eclipse root in the YAML file is overriden at the command line, which can be useful in ERT setups:

xtgeo_grid3d_map_apps --config myfile.yaml --root GULLFAKS

Possible command line options¶

Type:

xtgeo_grid3d_map_apps --help

Example of YAML setup¶

Preferred setup¶

title: Gullfaks

# choose oil, gas or both
mode: oil

# zonation is the layer range and name of zone(s), and can be spesiefied in a file (also YAML)
zonation:
  file: tests/yaml/002_x.yaml

eclinput:
  root: "../xtgeo-testdata/3dgrids/gfb/GULLFAKS_R003B-0"
  dates:
    - 19851001
    - 20000701

# diffmode: none (no diffs are made), withfirst, all
computesettings:
  diffmode: withfirst
  # critical saturations
  # compute mobile SOIL using SOGRC or SOWCR or None (sogcr, sowcr, None)
  critmode: sowcr
  # The "use_poro" is currently the safest way to compute HCPV per cell, but may be
  # wrong if PORV is edited during Eclipse run
  method: use_poro
  zone: Yes   # compute per zone
  all: No     # compute for ALL zones

# map definition
mapsettings:
  xori: 451000.0
  xinc: 100.0
  yori: 6779000.0
  yinc: 100.0
  ncol: 120
  nrow: 130

plotsettings:
  valuerange: [0, 20] # value range min/max (values above below will be truncated in plot!)
  xlabelrotation: 25  # Rotate the X axis labels (if they may overlap)
  colortable: cubehelix_r     # colours jet/rainbow/seismic/gnuplot/gnuplot2/...
                              # OR from RMS colour file

  # individual settings will override general plot settings!
  Tarbert:
    valuerange: [0, 10]


# output can be either mapfolder (preferred) or mapfile
# If mapfolder (and plotfolder), file names will be according to
# FMU standards. Folders here:
output:
  mapfolder: TMP
  plotfolder: docs/test_images

The zonation file:

# give zonation in a file (YAML; indent matters)
zranges:
  - Tarbert: [1, 6]
  - Ness: [7, 13]

Output plots (examples)¶

Difference map:

Old setup¶

The old YAML setup is still possible to use, but discouraged.

title: GullfaksFeltet

# choose oil, gas or both
mode: oil

# from - to layer range
layer_range: [1,47]

# give optional la name
zname: "Tarbert1 to Trabert2"

# just give rootname in case of "eclipserun" mode
root: "../xtgeo-testdata/3dgrids/gfb/GULLFAKS_R003B-0"

dates:
  - 19851001
  - 20000701

# diffmode: none (no diffs are made), withfirst, all
diffmode: withfirst

# critical saturations
# compute mobile SOIL using SOGRC or SOWCR or None (sogcr, sowcr, None)
critmode: sowcr

method: use_poro

# map definition
mapsettings:
  xori: 451000.0
  xinc: 100.0
  yori: 6779000.0
  yinc: 100.0
  ncol: 120
  nrow: 130

# these are root names; automatic extensions will be _<date>.png
# and _<date>.gri
mapfile: 'TMP/gull'
plotfile: 'TMP/gull'
